controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class controlling and handling events between model (eg. the game) and the view. This class acts like a third person avoiding direct communication between model and view. It contains a reference to Game and one to the view.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Controller.ThreadMovementEnemy
      Class Handling the enemies movement via a Timer.

        java.util.ArrayList<Controller.ThreadMovementEnemy> threadMovement
        ArrayList of threads handling Enenmy movement.

      • keyboardListener

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> keyboardListener
        Handler function for keyboards events. Each time a key is pressed, the controller updates the graphical elements and check if there is any collision or if the player has reached the door.

    • Method Detail

      • makeInstance

        public static Controller makeInstance()
        Method creating the instance of the controller
        Returns:
        the existing instance of the controller, creates it otherwise.

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Method creating and lauching a game. Allocates and creates all the graphical elements and all the model components.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the Stage(eg. window) the game has to be created in.

      • generateWalls

        private java.util.ArrayList generateWalls(java.util.Set<java.util.List<Vertex>> walls)
        Gather the graph vertices and build a list of edges.
        Parameters:
        walls - list of the non-connected nodes.
        Returns:
        An array list of numbers representing the coordinates of each wall.

      • areColliding

        private void areColliding(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Element> elementHashMap)
        Checks if there is any collision between the player and any element on screen. When a game is restarted, everything is generated again from scratch.
        Parameters:
        elementHashMap - The HashMap of a specific type of objects (Enemy,

      • isGameOver

        private void isGameOver()
        Checks if the game is over by getting to the door. When getting to the door, the game is resetted but the score remains the same.

      • moveEnemy

        private void moveEnemy()
        Starts a bunch of threads for handling enemy movements. Each enemy has its own movement thread. Each of these threads are stored in a arrayList.

      • stopMovements

        private void stopMovements()
        Cancels any enemy movements by shutting down every threads.
